list.name: Changes
list.comment:
This initial version implements a machine learning application that predicts the probability of earthquakes in Turkey based on planetary positions.
Key features: - Loads and filters earthquake data (CSV format) for Turkey (magnitude ≥ 5). - Computes planetary positions using the Skyfield library for any given date. - Trains a Random Forest model on historical planetary configurations. - Predicts earthquake probabilities for the next 10 years from today. - Displays a matplotlib line chart of probabilities over time. - Annotates peak probability dates over 0.8 for easy visual inspection.
Dependencies: pandas, numpy, skyfield, scikit-learn, joblib, matplotlib, tqdm
Automatically trains and predicts when executed.
